summary: In this context, nitrate is discussed in relation to the process of nitrate assimilation in the green alga Chlamydomonas sp. The review highlights how understanding this process in Chlamydomonas can provide insights into similar mechanisms in more complex photosynthetic organisms, particularly plants. The research emphasizes the significance of nitrate in metabolic processes and its regulatory steps, indicating a direct relationship between nitrate and the biological processes involved in its assimilation.
